data.event: It is one of the original counties of Georgia, created February 5, 1777.

event.title: saw the Seine and the Some, known today

data.event: Ribault named the rivers he saw the Seine and the Some, known today as the St. Marys and Satilla Rivers.
In 1565, Spain became alarmed by the French settlements and sent out a large force to take over and settle the area.

event.title: had resided on the island for at least four thousand years

data.event: At least two missions operated on Cumberland Island, ministering to the Timucuan people, who had resided on the island for at least four thousand years.
